monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Activates water orbs
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Armor Shred
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Beating
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Boulder Toss
skills.description: 1 x 500% physical damage (earth) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value, cannot be dodged

skills.name: Bounty
skills.description: This Monster gets 2 random Buffs when an enemy Monster is knocked out.

skills.name: Broken Immunity
skills.description: Unique Aura: Armor Break on enemies also increases chances to apply Debuffs on them by 20%.

skills.name: Cave Dwellers
skills.description: Aura: Heal all Beast and Occult Monsters in the party by 10% of their own Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Corrosive Assault
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 40% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff) - 40% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 80% (240%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 115% (460%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Death Blow
skills.description: Deals 5% increased damage for each Debuff on the target.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Devour
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an ally knocks out an enemy Monster, it is healed by 25% of that Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Elemental Strikes
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (fire/water/wind/earth) Hits all enemies, ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Flurry of Blows
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Giantsbane
skills.description: This Monster deals 5% more damage. Against enemies with a Health rating of 7 or higher, damage is increased by 20% instead.

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Every hit has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Hexed Touch
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply a random Debuff on the attacker.

skills.name: Initial Armor Break
skills.description: Apply Armor Break (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Life Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (300 + 7.5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 6% Max Health)

skills.name: Light Instinct
skills.description: Decrease damage taken by 15%.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Symbiosis
skills.description: Regenerate 5 Mana for each heal received.  (Triggers on any Healing effect)

skills.name: Multi Armor Break
skills.description: Aura: Armor Break (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Poison
skills.description: Aura: Poison (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Poison Eater
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Poison Eater Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Poison Glands
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Poison on the attacker.

skills.name: Recover
skills.description: Heals 10% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Stone Rain
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: When an ally would be attacked, 25% chance to redirect the attack to this Monster. (In PvP, redirecting monster takes 15% increased damage)

skills.name: Thick Skin
skills.description: This Monster takes 10% more damage from the element it's weak to. Other damage is reduced by 20%.

skills.name: Toxic Slam
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

drops.name: Level Badge
drops.description: Increases Monster level by 1. Can be used on monsters that are at least 2 levels below your highest monster.

drops.name: Monster Bell
drops.description: Respawns all defeated wild Monsters immediately
